posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Young, Evers, M. Brown
posts.post_content:
Posted By: David U
Hello, I'm looking for a T206 Cy Young bare hand, Evers portrait and M Brown Cubs on shirt. I'm interested in grades of psa 1-2 / sgc 10-30. The card should present well on the front. A scan and price would be appreciated. Please contact me at dru724@yahoo.com. Thanks, -David
